Service Details: - Provides easier, secure access to provincial government services for BC residents- Offers three different versions to suit individual needs:  a combined BC Driver’s Licence/BC Services Card, a Photo BC Services Card, and a Non-Photo BC Services Card
Eligibility: Ages: 19 year(s) and up- Eligible BC residents age 19 and over- Please click on the "Additional Information" link above for details information on applying for this card- Drivers can opt to have separate Driver's Licence and BC Services Card or have them combined into one- Newborns, children, youth to age 19 and those age 74 will be provided with a Non-Photo BC Services Card
Cost: There is no fee to get a BC Services Card. If combining with Driver's Licence, regular Driver's Licencing fees will still apply
Address & Map: Insurance Corporation of BC1720 Springfield RdKelowna, BC     V1Y 7W2
